quote: My hand lowered slowly to my side. It trembled. ""There is no affection,"" I said, each syllable a measured force of emotion I dared not allow purchase, ""that will endure when treated as a thing.
quote_letters: MY HAND LOWERED SLOWLY TO MY SIDE IT TREMBLED THERE IS NO AFFECTION I SAID EACH SYLLABLE A MEASURED FORCE OF EMOTION I DARED NOT ALLOW PURCHASE THAT WILL ENDURE WHEN TREATED AS A THING
